## How to Test
Steps or commands to verify (include logs/screenshots for bot replies if relevant).

```bash

```

## Checklist
- [ ] Lint passes (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Tests pass (`npm test`)
- [ ] Env vars documented/added to `.env.example` if needed
- [ ] No secrets committed
